job_offer_intro:
^Hi Fei Yang! I'm Jason from LUX Commerce Asia, and I saw your resume online.

We're hiring part-time E-Commerce Task Partners to assist with product engagement for brands like Shopee, Lazada, and Tiktok Shop.

Tasks are done remotely via your phone and take under 10 minutes each. You'll earn up to $80-$180 per day, paid out every evening via PayNow. Interested?
^Sounds good! What do I need to do?
^Can I know more about how it works?
^Is this a freelance role or official employment?
job_offer_reply_1:
^Great! You'll be working with our AI-matching task portal.

It shows products needing engagement (likes, wishlist, carting), and you help boost them. Every 3-5 tasks form a "group" and completing a group earns you 8-12% commission.

To activate your profile, the portal will ask for an initial purchase cycle - just small starter tasks to verify activity. The platform returns your amount + commission instantly after each group.
^Okay, I'll register and try a few tasks.
^Do I need to spend money to start?
job_offer_reply_2:
^That's a good question! This is a freelance contractor role - you'll be classified under our remote contributor program.

We work with part-timers and freelancers who want to earn flexible income on their own time. No long-term commitment is required, and we process payouts daily via PayNow.
^Sounds good, I'd like to know how the tasks work.
^Can I verify this role through your official site or company HR?
job_task_reply_1:
^That's a great question - and totally understandable.

You're not paying us anything. The system simply requires that new users complete a purchase cycle, which simulates a real transaction.

For example, a group may ask you to cart or wishlist 3 items, costing around $25-$40. Once you complete the group, the platform returns the amount along with your commission, directly to your balance.

This helps confirm your account isn't a bot and ensures smooth payout tracking.
^Okay, that makes sense. I'll give it a try.
^Can I start without doing a purchase cycle?
job_task_reply_2:
^I totally understand your concern.

Unfortunately, the purchase cycle is a required step to unlock task access - it's part of the portal's anti-bot and fraud prevention system. It's not a payment to us, and it's not a fee - it's just a simulation of an actual task.

Once you complete it, your full amount plus 8-12% commission is immediately reflected in your dashboard, and you'll be eligible to withdraw after completing three groups.

We've had thousands of users go through the same process smoothly.
^Okay, that makes sense. I'll give it a try.
^Can you guarantee I'll get the money back after the task?
job_task_reply_3:
^Yes, absolutely - the system is automated and built to credit both your task amount and commission immediately after each completed group.

For example, if your task cycle involves $25, your balance will show $28.25 right after.

We've processed over 2,000 contributor payouts this month alone, and all successful applicants receive their earnings as long as tasks are completed correctly. If you face any delay, our support team is available 24/7 to help.
^Alright, I'll go ahead with the task.
^Can I see a sample payout proof before I continue?
job_task_reply_4: ^Alright, I'll go ahead with the task.
job_verification_reply_1:
^Absolutely, I understand the importance of verification. Our contributor recruitment is handled through a private onboarding system under our vendor management team, so this specific role isn't listed on our public site. But I can get someone from our admin team to follow up with a confirmation email, if needed.

Meanwhile, if you'd like, I can walk you through the process step-by-step here.
^Okay, I'll proceed with your help here first.
^Yes, please ask them to email me first. I'll wait for the confirmation.
